Function Documentation

void SCH_DisableProcessing ( void   ) 

Informs SCH Application that processing of schedule table should halt.

Description
This API increments the disable schedule table processing reference count. Each time this API is called must be matched with a similar call to the SCH_EnableProcessing API before the SCH Application will resume processing of the schedule table.
Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
None

void SCH_EnableProcessing ( void   ) 

Informs SCH Application that processing of schedule table can resume.

Description
This API decrements the disable schedule table processing reference count. Once all disable references have been eliminated, the SCH application will resume schedule table processing.
Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
None

boolean SCH_GetProcessingState ( void   ) 

Obtains SCH Application processing state.

Description
This API returns a TRUE/FALSE indication as to whether the SCH Application is allowed to process the contents of the Schedule table.
Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
None
Returns:
TRUE Schedule Table Processing is Enabled
FALSE Schedule Table Processing is Disabled
